vote.title: Authorize the second step of acquisition for condemnation by eminent domain to acquire approximately 15,065 square feet of land located near the intersection of Scottsdale Drive and Carr Street from Nancy Ruth Lander and John B. Reece for the Dallas Water Utilities Distribution Division Scottsdale Drive Project - Not to exceed $78,500.00 ($75,000.00, plus closing cost and title expenses not to exceed $3,500.00) - Financing: Water Construction Fund
